name: Pel-Aid® Gelatin Binder and Lubricant
description: Pel-Aid® Gelatin Binder and Lubricant is a unique pelleting aid(technical gelatin)that serves as both a lubricant and binder.The typical use rate ofPel-Aidis 1to 2lb per ton of feed but can go as high as 10 lb per ton.The heat and moisture in the conditioning chamber liquifies Pel-Aid. As a liquid, it lubricates the entire feed mixture and makes faster pelleting possible. When it cools, Pel-Aidsolidifies, binding each pellet throughout.Pel-Aidis a high quality porcine gelatin.Pel-Aidis a high protein source an contains over 85% crude proteinPel-Aidingredients have AAFCO approval and are safe to use in animal feed.
